name: Embrace The Sunshine
description:
Sometimes, life can be sad. But it doesn't always have to be that way! 

You play as the Sun. Help the Sad Objects remember the happiness of life by shining your light at them. But watch out! Mad Objects won't accept your light, so you'll lose your sunniness in the process. 

What are you waiting for? Get to the city, bring your sunshine to it!
